title: [砌機含LIST]電腦新手JJ插冰求指教

replies.msg:
想砌部desktop
筆直$7000左右

RAM: Kingston Hyper X Fury 16GB DDR4 2400 Memory Kit (8GB x2) (~$1000)
Hard drive: Toshiba DT01ACA200 2TB (~$500)
